participant_1.background:
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that its italian.
I enjoy spending time with my family and pets, and I also like to read, play games, and watch movies.
i also love orange juice.
i work for a newspaper.

participant_2.background:
I'm excited to drive my new car in any weather!
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
I'm a writer who enjoys spending time with my dog.
I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family.
I run every morning before work to clear my head and relieve stress.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I love playing guitar! But I find I don't practice enough.
That's a bummer. I love playing guitar too. I try to practice every day.
What kind of guitar do you play?
I have an acoustic guitar and an electric.
Nice! I have an electric too. What kind of music do you like to play?
I love playing all sorts of music, but my favorite is blues.
Blues is great! I love the sound of the slide guitar.
Me too! I wish I was better at playing slide guitar.
It's not as hard as it looks! There are lots of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check some out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Have you ever been to a blues concert?
I have! I went to a blues festival last year and it was amazing.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go to a blues festival.
You should definitely go to one! They're always a great time.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
